archimate:Requirement.name: R11 Standard customer presentations on QSP topics are developed
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Security Awareness standard support material
U26 As Country Heads of Tietoevry Tech Services with his teams, I want to have good quality and easily available presentations about security and compliance topics to convice our customers that we are secure. U27 As Head of Strategic Deals with his/her teams (answering RFPs) I want to have a good quality presentationto be able to sell to our customers that security is an internal part of our solutions. U34 As Security Awareness Project Owner I want to send a common message to our customers so we can be seen as one Tieto and in synch with our sales.
QSP is no more, therefore this requirement is deprecated.
